attributes.additional_details:
Nurse staffing levels are still not safe . http://www.bmj.com/content/353/bmj.i2665.full.print

Senior nurses should stand up for nursing http://www.bmj.com/content/bmj/352/bmj.i978.full.pdf

The Bawa-Garba case, doctors, and the GMC—what next? http://www.bmj.com/content/360/bmj.k646/rapid-responses
attributes.background: Blame is passed to nurses or doctors rather than the senior managment or ministers who have failed to ensure there are safe numbers of properly trained staff to care for patients.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about regulatory structures in the NHS, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
